EmailTemplate.description: This is to notify the region heads that NDA has been created or change for their region
EmailTemplate.name: Notification for NDA to Region Head
EmailTemplate.subject: Notification that a new NDA has been initiated for {!Apttus__APTS_Agreement__c.Apttus__Account__c} from the Region: {!Apttus__APTS_Agreement__c.Region__c}
